name: Tangy Coleslaw
description: Get your â€˜slaw on with this tangy summer side dish! Coleslaw is packed with fiber and nutrients like Vitamin C, magnesium, potassium, and more. Add some crunch anywhere: serve coleslaw alongside grilled meats and burgers; top tacos, hot dogs, sandwiches, baked potatoes, or sliders; or fill wraps or burritos.
preparation: In large bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, and mix.
Using the 4-in-1 Mandoline, thinly slice cabbage. Add to bowl; stir to combine. Salad will keep well, refrigerated, up to 3 days.
tips: One Coleslaw Dressing Mix recipe makes 1 cup coleslaw dressing.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 corn tortilla, 4 oz (113 g) chicken, and 1 tbsp guacamole.

products.name: Coleslaw Dressing Mix
summary: The ultimate summer salad, just add a few simple ingredients to make the most delish coleslaw with notes of dill and a hint of sweetness. Each jar makes 6 cups of creamy or vinaigrette-style dressing so you can easily feed a crowd at a backyard barbecue.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
